scripts.build:binaries: yarn build && rimraf out && pkg --no-bytecode --public-packages '*' --output out/kyve package.json && node ./node_modules/@kyve/core/dist/src/scripts/checksum.js
scripts.startvalidator: node ./dist/src/index.js --poolId 0 -m 'behind field portion tent move cross case other call senior obtain seminar' --keyfile ./keyfile.json -s 175.2 --verbose
scripts.start:fresh: npm run build && npm run start
